SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: IEA (2016) Energy Technology Perspectives Transportation Summary, via email communication, 10 June, 2016
Common Units: billion passenger-km/km of HSR track / Whole Runway/year
Assumptions: We use Airports Council International for estimated number of commercial airports, and assume 2 runways per airport, then divide IEA air travel estimates by the number of commercial runways.
